comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Mrs Fred Welsh is Brahna Weinstein, a Jewish Russian girl who anglicised her name to Fanny Weston when her family moved to the East Side. For Freddie Welsh, see [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6011904216/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The photo of Welsh and his wife appears to have been taken during their visit to the offices of the Bain News Agency. A rack of the Bain glass negative files is visible behind him. It is likely that the photos of Welsh posing on a rooftop were taken on the roof of Bain's building.

Another photo of Bain negative file shelves:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163011685/]

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: As if Freddie Welsh's life wasn't amazing enough, he married a woman with some character of her own.  Thanks for providing her name(s). Wish we knew more about her life.  I'm wondering why the two of them would have been at the newpaper office, Wystan.  Any ideas? Had he just won the title?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Why was she in the Bain Agency's office? People who are in love enjoy going everywhere together. (But she doesn't appear to have climbed up to the roof, for the photos that were taken there.)
